name: GetItSMS WhatsApp APIs
description:
Send And Receive WhatsApp Bulk Messages(WhatsApp Marketing Messages) Through Whatsapp Business API Gateway(WhatsApp Green Tick Verification). For the Purpose Of Sending Notifications, OTPs, Or Anything Else Using Our WhatsApp Business API (WhatsApp Official API) Or WhatsApp OTP API and WhatsApp Chatbot. For Demo Contact Us(+91-7976724242) Or Register Here - http://sms.getitsms.com/signup 

Shopify Integration - https://apps.shopify.com/wpplugins

api_methods.name: GetIT SMS WHATSAPP API
api_methods.description: We are providing bulk whatsapp sms services.To use our whatsapp bulk sms  service you need api key.Go through our application and get our service.

utterances.utterance: Can you send a WhatsApp message to 919812345678 with the text 'Your order #12345 has been shipped and will arrive tomorrow' using the service ID 45?

parameters.your_message: Your order #12345 has been shipped and will arrive tomorrow

utterances.utterance: Please notify 919876543210 on WhatsApp that the meeting scheduled for 3 PM today is postponed, using ID 45.

parameters.your_message: The meeting scheduled for 3 PM today is postponed

utterances.utterance: I want to send a bulk WhatsApp message to 919900112233 saying 'Flash sale starts at 6 PM! Don't miss out!' with the ID 45.

parameters.your_message: Flash sale starts at 6 PM! Don't miss out!

utterances.utterance: Could you send a WhatsApp OTP message to 919988776655 with 'Your OTP for login is 482913' using the service ID 45?
Send a WhatsApp notification to 919955443322 informing 'Your subscription to TechDaily has been renewed successfully' with ID 45.

parameters.your_message: Your subscription to TechDaily has been renewed successfully

utterances.utterance: I need to broadcast a WhatsApp message to 919977665544 that says 'Reminder: Yoga class starts at 7 AM tomorrow' using ID 45.

parameters.your_message: Reminder: Yoga class starts at 7 AM tomorrow

utterances.utterance: Please send a WhatsApp alert to 919933221100 about 'Your flight AI202 to New Delhi is delayed by 2 hours' with the service ID 45.

parameters.your_message: Your flight AI202 to New Delhi is delayed by 2 hours

utterances.utterance: Could you deliver a WhatsApp marketing message to 919944556677 that reads 'Get 20% off on all electronics this weekend!' using ID 45?

parameters.your_message: Get 20% off on all electronics this weekend!

utterances.utterance: Send a WhatsApp message to 919911223344 saying 'Your appointment with Dr. Sharma is confirmed for 10 AM on 15th June' using the ID 45.

parameters.your_message: Your appointment with Dr. Sharma is confirmed for 10 AM on 15th June

utterances.utterance: I want to send a WhatsApp bulk message to 919900998877 with 'Join our webinar on digital marketing this Friday at 5 PM' using service ID 45.

parameters.your_message: Join our webinar on digital marketing this Friday at 5 PM
